summary: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Jeanne Moreau|Monica Vitti|Bernhard Wicki|Rosy Mazzacurati|Maria Pia Luzi|Guido A. title: La noche
